description.value:
You form a needle of acidic material and thrust it towards a creature or an object that is not being worn or carried within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 acid damage and if it is a creature it gains the @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.R54LQEKSDXNQ3N75]{Bleeding} condition.

Each time you would inflict @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.R54LQEKSDXNQ3N75]{Bleeding} on a creature that is already at the maximum stacks, deal an additional 1d6 piercing damage instead.

 

Charge: This is a spell that can be Charged, modifying its effects. Costs and effects are as follow:

  • 1 Mana: Inflict an additional stack of bleeding on a hit.
  • 1 Mana: The acid damage is increased to 2d6.
  • 2 Mana: The acid damage is increased to 3d6.
